info.description: API for retrieving information about Perguruan Tinggi, Program Studi, Dosen, and Mahasiswa in Indonesia.
info.author: ridwaanhall

api_overview.name: api-overview
api_overview.description: Provides an overview of the available API endpoints.

all.name: search-all
all.description: Searches across all entities with the given keyword.

pt.name: search-pt
pt.description: Searches for Perguruan Tinggi with the given keyword.

prodi.name: search-prodi
prodi.description: Searches for Program Studi with the given keyword.

dosen.name: search-dosen
dosen.description: Searches for Dosen with the given keyword.

mahasiswa.name: search-mahasiswa
mahasiswa.description: Searches for Mahasiswa with the given keyword.

detail.name: pt-detail
detail.description: Retrieves detailed information about a Perguruan Tinggi.

prodi.name: pt-prodi
prodi.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi within a Perguruan Tinggi for a specific semester.

rasio.name: pt-rasio
rasio.description: Retrieves the student-to-lecturer ratio for a Perguruan Tinggi.

mahasiswa.name: pt-mahasiswa
mahasiswa.description: Retrieves the average graduation rate of new students for a Perguruan Tinggi.

waktu_studi.name: pt-waktu-studi
waktu_studi.description: Retrieves the average study duration of a Perguruan Tinggi

riwayat.name: pt-riwayat
riwayat.description: Retrieves the history of a Perguruan Tinggi.

biaya_kuliah.name: pt-biaya-kuliah
biaya_kuliah.description: Retrieves the tuition fee information for a Perguruan Tinggi.

fasilitas.name: pt-fasilitas
fasilitas.description: Retrieves the facilities information for a Perguruan Tinggi.

logo.name: pt-logo
logo.description: Retrieves the logo of a Perguruan Tinggi.

detail.name: prodi-detail
detail.description: Retrieves detailed information about a Program Studi.

desc.name: prodi-desc
desc.description: Retrieves description of a Program Studi.

jumlah_mhs_dosen.name: prodi-num-students-lecturers
jumlah_mhs_dosen.description: Retrieves number of student and lecturer in a Program Studi.

riwayat.name: prodi-riwayat
riwayat.description: Retrieves the history of a Program Studi.

biaya_kuliah.name: prodi-biaya-kuliah
biaya_kuliah.description: Retrieves the tuition fee information for a Program Studi.

dosen_homebase.name: prodi-dosen-homebase
dosen_homebase.description: Retrieves the list of lecturers with homebase in Program Studi for a specific semester.

dosen_penghitung_ratio.name: prodi-dosen-penghitung-ratio
dosen_penghitung_ratio.description: Retrieves the list of lecturers that is counted for student lecturer ratio in Program Studi for a specific semester.

profile.name: dosen-profile
profile.description: Retrieves the profile information for a Dosen.

study_history.name: dosen-riwayat-pendidikan
study_history.description: Retrieves the education history of a Dosen.

teaching_history.name: dosen-riwayat-mengajar
teaching_history.description: Retrieves the teaching history of a Dosen.

portofolio_penelitian.name: dosen-portofolio-penelitian
portofolio_penelitian.description: Retrieves the research portfolio of a Dosen.

portofolio_pengabdian.name: dosen-portofolio-pengabdian
portofolio_pengabdian.description: Retrieves the community service portfolio of a Dosen.

portofolio_karya.name: dosen-portofolio-karya
portofolio_karya.description: Retrieves the work portfolio of a Dosen.

portofolio_paten.name: dosen-portofolio-paten
portofolio_paten.description: Retrieves the patent portfolio of a Dosen.

count.name: mhs-count
count.description: Retrieves the total count of Mahasiswa.

count_active.name: mhs-count-active
count_active.description: Retrieves the count of active Mahasiswa.

count_gender.name: mhs-count-gender
count_gender.description: Retrieves the count of Mahasiswa based on gender.

count_bidang_ilmu.name: mhs-count-bidang-ilmu
count_bidang_ilmu.description: Retrieves the count of Mahasiswa based on the field of study.

count_status.name: mhs-count-status
count_status.description: Retrieves the count of Mahasiswa based on their status.

count_jenjang.name: mhs-count-jenjang
count_jenjang.description: Retrieves the count of Mahasiswa based on their level of education.

count_kelompok_lembaga.name: mhs-count-kelompok-lembaga
count_kelompok_lembaga.description: Retrieves the count of Mahasiswa based on their institutional group.

count.name: dosen-count
count.description: Retrieves the total count of Dosen.

count_active.name: dosen-count-active
count_active.description: Retrieves the count of active Dosen.

count_gender.name: dosen-count-gender
count_gender.description: Retrieves the count of Dosen based on gender.

count_bidang.name: dosen-count-bidang
count_bidang.description: Retrieves the count of Dosen based on their field.

count_keaktifan.name: dosen-count-keaktifan
count_keaktifan.description: Retrieves the count of Dosen based on their activeness status.

count_jenjang.name: dosen-count-jenjang
count_jenjang.description: Retrieves the count of Dosen based on their educational level.

count_ikatan.name: dosen-count-ikatan
count_ikatan.description: Retrieves the count of Dosen based on their employment status.

count.name: pt-count
count.description: Retrieves the total count of Perguruan Tinggi.

count_province.name: pt-count-province
count_province.description: Retrieves the count of Perguruan Tinggi based on province.

count_kelompok_pembina.name: pt-kelompok-pembina-count
count_kelompok_pembina.description: Retrieves the count of Perguruan Tinggi based on their supervisory group.

count_akreditasi.name: pt-akreditasi-count
count_akreditasi.description: Retrieves the count of Perguruan Tinggi based on accreditation.

count_bentuk_pt.name: pt-bentuk-pt-count
count_bentuk_pt.description: Retrieves the count of Perguruan Tinggi based on its type.

count.name: prodi-count
count.description: Retrieves the total count of Program Studi.

bidang_ilmu_terbanyak.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-terbanyak-count
bidang_ilmu_terbanyak.description: Retrieves the count of Program Studi based on the most numerous field.

kelompok_pembina.name: prodi-kelompok-pembina-count
kelompok_pembina.description: Retrieves the count of Program Studi based on the supervising group.

bidang_ilmu.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-count
bidang_ilmu.description: Retrieves the count of Program Studi based on their field.

akreditasi.name: prodi-akreditasi-count
akreditasi.description: Retrieves the count of Program Studi based on their accreditation.

jenjang.name: prodi-jenjang-count
jenjang.description: Retrieves the count of Program Studi based on their educational level.

agama.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-agama
agama.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Agama.

ekonomi.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-ekonomi
ekonomi.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Ekonomi.

humaniora.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-humaniora
humaniora.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Humaniora.

kesehatan.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-kesehatan
kesehatan.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Kesehatan.

mipa.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-mipa
mipa.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as MIPA.

pendidikan.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-pendidikan
pendidikan.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Pendidikan.

pertanian.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-pertanian
pertanian.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Pertanian.

seni.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-seni
seni.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Seni.

sosial.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-sosial
sosial.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Sosial.

teknik.name: prodi-bidang-ilmu-teknik
teknik.description: Retrieves the list of Program Studi that categorized as Teknik.
